name: tm74
effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user tackles the foe from a
high-speed spin. The slower the user,
the greater the damage.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user tackles the foe from a
high-speed spin. The slower the user,
the greater the damage.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user tackles the foe from a
high-speed spin. The slower the user,
the greater the damage.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed
spin. The slower the user compared to the
target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous
liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target
is poisoned.
